name: MAILCHIMP__GET_LISTS
description: Retrieve all audience lists from Mailchimp with their subscriber counts and campaign statistics.

name: MAILCHIMP__GET_LIST_MEMBERS
description: Retrieve members from a specific Mailchimp audience list with their subscription status and details.

list_id.description: The unique ID of the list

name: MAILCHIMP__ADD_LIST_MEMBER
description: Add a new member to a Mailchimp audience list with email address and merge fields.

list_id.description: The unique ID of the list

merge_fields.description: Merge field data for the subscriber

name: MAILCHIMP__GET_CAMPAIGNS
description: Retrieve email campaigns from Mailchimp with their status, statistics, and settings.

name: MAILCHIMP__CREATE_CAMPAIGN
description: Create a new email campaign in Mailchimp with content, settings, and audience targeting.

list_id.description: List ID to send the campaign to

name: MAILCHIMP__SET_CAMPAIGN_CONTENT
description: Set the HTML content for a Mailchimp campaign with templates and personalization options.

campaign_id.description: The unique ID of the campaign

plain_text.description: Plain text content for the campaign

name: MAILCHIMP__SEND_CAMPAIGN
description: Send a prepared Mailchimp campaign to its target audience immediately.

campaign_id.description: The unique ID of the campaign to send

name: MAILCHIMP__GET_CAMPAIGN_REPORTS
description: Retrieve detailed performance reports for sent Mailchimp campaigns including opens, clicks, and bounces.

campaign_id.description: The unique ID of the campaign

name: MAILCHIMP__GET_AUTOMATIONS
description: Retrieve marketing automation workflows from Mailchimp with their triggers and performance data.

name: MAILCHIMP__CREATE_LIST
description: Create a new audience list in Mailchimp with contact information and compliance settings.

name: MAILCHIMP__DELETE_LIST
description: Permanently delete an audience list from Mailchimp along with all its members and associated data.

list_id.description: The unique ID of the list to delete

name: MAILCHIMP__UPDATE_LIST_MEMBER
description: Update an existing member in a Mailchimp audience list with new information or subscription status.

list_id.description: The unique ID of the list

subscriber_hash.description: MD5 hash of the member's email address

name: MAILCHIMP__DELETE_LIST_MEMBER
description: Permanently delete a member from a Mailchimp audience list, removing all their data and history.

list_id.description: The unique ID of the list

subscriber_hash.description: MD5 hash of the member's email address

name: MAILCHIMP__GET_LIST_MEMBER
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific member in a Mailchimp audience list.

list_id.description: The unique ID of the list

subscriber_hash.description: MD5 hash of the member's email address

name: MAILCHIMP__DELETE_CAMPAIGN
description: Permanently delete a campaign from Mailchimp, removing it and all associated data.

campaign_id.description: The unique ID of the campaign to delete

name: MAILCHIMP__UPDATE_CAMPAIGN
description: Update an existing campaign in Mailchimp with new settings, content, or audience targeting.

campaign_id.description: The unique ID of the campaign

name: MAILCHIMP__PAUSE_CAMPAIGN
description: Pause a scheduled or sending campaign in Mailchimp to make changes or stop delivery.

campaign_id.description: The unique ID of the campaign to pause

name: MAILCHIMP__RESUME_CAMPAIGN
description: Resume a paused campaign in Mailchimp to continue sending to the target audience.

campaign_id.description: The unique ID of the campaign to resume

name: MAILCHIMP__SCHEDULE_CAMPAIGN
description: Schedule a campaign to be sent at a specific time in Mailchimp with timezone settings.

campaign_id.description: The unique ID of the campaign to schedule

name: MAILCHIMP__UNSCHEDULE_CAMPAIGN
description: Unschedule a scheduled campaign in Mailchimp, returning it to draft status for further editing.

campaign_id.description: The unique ID of the campaign to unschedule

name: MAILCHIMP__GET_TEMPLATES
description: Retrieve email templates from Mailchimp account for use in campaigns and automations.

name: MAILCHIMP__CREATE_TEMPLATE
description: Create a new email template in Mailchimp with HTML content and design settings.

name: MAILCHIMP__DELETE_TEMPLATE
description: Permanently delete an email template from Mailchimp account.

template_id.description: The unique ID of the template to delete

name: MAILCHIMP__GET_SEGMENTS
description: Retrieve audience segments from a Mailchimp list for targeted marketing campaigns.

list_id.description: The unique ID of the list

name: MAILCHIMP__CREATE_SEGMENT
description: Create a new audience segment in Mailchimp with specific conditions and targeting rules.

list_id.description: The unique ID of the list

static_segment.description: Array of email addresses for static segment

match.description: Whether to match any or all conditions

name: MAILCHIMP__DELETE_SEGMENT
description: Delete an audience segment from a Mailchimp list permanently.

list_id.description: The unique ID of the list

segment_id.description: The unique ID of the segment to delete

name: MAILCHIMP__GET_TAGS
description: Retrieve all tags from a Mailchimp audience list for subscriber organization and segmentation.

list_id.description: The unique ID of the list

name: MAILCHIMP__ADD_MEMBER_TAGS
description: Add tags to a member in a Mailchimp audience list for better organization and targeting.

list_id.description: The unique ID of the list

subscriber_hash.description: MD5 hash of the member's email address

tags.description: Array of tags to add or update

name: MAILCHIMP__GET_ACCOUNT_INFO
description: Retrieve general account information from Mailchimp including plan details, contact info, and settings.

name: MAILCHIMP__BATCH_SUBSCRIBE_MEMBERS
description: Add or update multiple members to a Mailchimp list in a single batch operation for efficiency.

list_id.description: The unique ID of the list

members.description: Array of members to add or update

name: MAILCHIMP__GET_CLICK_REPORTS
description: Retrieve click tracking reports for a campaign in Mailchimp with link performance data.

campaign_id.description: The unique ID of the campaign

count.description: Number of click details to return

offset.description: Number of click details to skip

name: MAILCHIMP__GET_OPEN_REPORTS
description: Retrieve open tracking reports for a campaign in Mailchimp with subscriber engagement data.

campaign_id.description: The unique ID of the campaign

count.description: Number of open details to return

offset.description: Number of open details to skip

name: MAILCHIMP__GET_UNSUBSCRIBE_REPORTS
description: Retrieve unsubscribe reports for a campaign in Mailchimp to analyze opt-out patterns and reasons.

campaign_id.description: The unique ID of the campaign

count.description: Number of unsubscribe details to return

offset.description: Number of unsubscribe details to skip

name: MAILCHIMP__CREATE_AUTOMATION
description: Create a new marketing automation workflow in Mailchimp with triggers and email sequences.

from_name.description: Default from name for automation emails

name: MAILCHIMP__START_AUTOMATION
description: Start a paused automation workflow in Mailchimp to begin sending emails to triggered subscribers.

workflow_id.description: The unique ID of the automation workflow

name: MAILCHIMP__PAUSE_AUTOMATION
description: Pause an active automation workflow in Mailchimp to stop sending emails to new triggers.

workflow_id.description: The unique ID of the automation workflow
